articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets New Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets New Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, together with Vice-Premier Ro Tu Chol, met and had a talk with Liu Hongcai, new Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: DPRK-Cuba Solidarity Committee Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK-Cuba Solidarity Committee Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba led by Chairman Kim Yong Jin, who is minister of Education, left here Tuesday to attend the 5th Asia-Pacific regional meeting for solidarity with Cuba to be held in Laos.
					 Arriving here on the same day were a delegation of the Cambodia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group led by Som Chen, member of the National Assembly of Cambodia and chairman of the group, and a delegation of the Polish Foreign Ministry headed by Director Krzysztof Szumski.

articles.title: April Spring People's Art Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
April Spring People's Art Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Second April Spring People's Art Festival will be held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The festival is to be held at theatres, concert halls and cultural houses in Pyongyang from April 11 to 19, divided into various groups. It will involve individual and group performances and joint presentations.
					
					 It will bring together members of art troupes, art squads and itinerary art agitation squads and people from all walks of life in Pyongyang and local areas and overseas Korean artistes.

articles.title: New Symphonies Created
articles.content:
New Symphonies Created
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- New symphonies have recently been created by the State Symphony Orchestra of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Orchestral pieces "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and "Reach for Ultramodern Science," symphonic poem "For My Only Motherland" and other numbers are of high ideological and artistic value.
					
					 In particular "Reach for Ultramodern Science," reflecting the spirit of the times, gives a representation of the Korean people pushing ahead with the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 Orchestral piece "The Sound of the Cowbell", unique in composition, rich in colors and different in means of performance, reminds the audience of vast, affluent fields.
					
					 Orchestral music "'My Home Village', Selection of Korean Famous Songs" makes a deep impression on the audience for its significant theme and for the large scale, rich sound and diversified colors of the performance.
					
					 Also included in the new program of the orchestra are string quartet "Father's Best Wishes", violin ensemble "Let's Drink a Toast" and other instrumental pieces and foreign music.

articles.title: Magnesite Production Up
articles.content:
Magnesite Production Up
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Magnesite production has been boosted in mines of Tanchon area, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Taehung Youth Hero Mine has made a good job in the magnesite production and processing with a goal of fulfilling this year's plan by October 10, the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The June 5 and Western Pits of the Ryongyang Mine have steadily increased the productivity by putting stopes on large-sized and modern basis.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to mines of the Tanchon area several times.
					
					 When visiting the Taehung Youth Hero Mine in May Juche 98 (2009), he said that the mine, with a large deposit of high-grade magnesite, should be turned, in a far-sighted way, into the world's leading mineral producer.
					
					 Magnesite, badly needed for metal industry and other economic sectors, is abundantly deposited in Korea.
					
					 The Tanchon area alone is endowed with a deposit of billions of tons and has good mining conditions.

articles.title: US Scheme for Preemptive Nuclear Attack on DPRK
articles.content:
US Scheme for Preemptive Nuclear Attack on DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- It has been reported that "OPLAN 8010," a comprehensive operation plan of the U.S. Strategic Command supervising its forces' nuclear strategy in a unified way, includes a detailed scenario for mounting preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and other countries after designating them as "potential targets for nuclear attack".
					  It has also been disclosed that the U.S. administration, in a new report on nuclear policy now in the making, is contemplating the development of a new type offensive weapon for preemptive attack to cope with "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 These facts go to prove that the U.S. scheme for preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK has entered the stage of implementation, Minju Joson says in a signed commentary today.
					
					 It is exactly the U.S. nuclear strategy to realize its design for domination over the world by monopolizing nukes and reigning supreme in the field of strategic offensive arms, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK is the main target of the U.S. in carrying into practice its strategy for preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 The U.S. has worked out the war scenario aimed at preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK from long ago and is watching for a chance to put it into practice while steadily renovating it.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to put the whole of the Korean Peninsula under its control through such surprising attack on the DPRK and turn it into a strategic base for military domination and control over Asia.
					
					 Needless to say, the ongoing Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises of the U.S. warmongers and the south Korean puppet forces are a nuclear war game intended to make a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is mistaken if it calculates that it will be able to attain its aim of aggression by a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces had better stop their rash acts, clearly mindful that such adventurous attempt is as foolish an act as precipitating their own destruction.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Warmongers' New War Scenario Blasted
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Warmongers' New War Scenario Blasted
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- It has been recently disclosed that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces are working out "OPLAN 5012", a new scenario for invading the DPRK, under the pretext of coping with the "transfer of the right to command the wartime operations."
					 It was reported that they had already wrapped up in the main the discussion on such key issues as the codename, system and conception of the new operation plan by December last year.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The "OPLAN 5012" is a war scenario more dangerous and provocative than the "OPLAN 5027", a scenario for an all-out war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 They opened the contents of the above-said new scenario to media though it is a top secret document. This is an undisguised threat and blackmail against the DPRK and, at the same time, a revelation of their military scheme to stifle it by force of arms.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is the fact that the "OPLAN 5012" has already been applied to the exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 Pursuant to the keynote of the above-said operation plan, the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises were staged in August last year and the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are now at their height.
					
					 All facts go to prove that "peace" and "improved relations" much touted by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are nothing but empty talks and they are pursuing only a sinister aim to seize the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is inching close to the brink of a war due to their frantic moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 If they unleash a nuclear war against the DPRK, its army and people will mete out a resolute and merciless punishment to the provokers, the commentary warns, urging: They had better stop acting rashly, properly understanding the revolutionary will of the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: US Surprise Invasion of Other Countries Termed Trite War Method
articles.content:
US Surprise Invasion of Other Countries Termed Trite War Method
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- No one can guess when and how the U.S. imperialists will launch a surprise invasion of the DPRK in collusion with the south Korean puppet warmongers while staging the adventurous Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in the Korean Peninsula, observes Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article.
					 A surprise invasion of other countries is a trite war method employed by the U.S.-led imperialists, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are now seeking to use the south Korean puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries as bullet shields and shock brigades for executing their war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 They keep huge aggression forces in south Korea and its vicinity on a permanent basis in order to ignite the second Korean war. Their mobile strike means based in the U.S. mainland and the Pacific region are involved in frequent war maneuvers staged in these areas.
					
					 The involvement of their huge armed forces and latest military hardware in the on-going Key Resolve and Foal Eagle brings to light their offensive and dangerous nature.
					
					 The "peace" trumpeted by the U.S. while beefing up its armed forces and staging war exercises is nothing but a smoke screen to conceal its scenario for a surprise invasion of other countries.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists use all forms of frequent war maneuvers as main levers for putting their operations for surprise invasion into practice.
					
					 As adage "No smoke without fire" says, the U.S. imperialists' ceaseless military exercises are bound to lead to a war anytime.
					
					  It is the U.S. mode of existence to seek a way out of a serious political and economic crisis in a war.
					
					 The U.S., finding itself in a tight corner at home and abroad, kicked off the on-going adventurous war maneuvers in south Korea in a bid to get rid of it and launch a surprise invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK neither want a war nor fear it. 
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists perpetrate a surprise invasion of the DPRK, they will meet a miserable end.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Confrontation Hysteria Snubbed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Confrontation Hysteria Snubbed
						
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are becoming vociferous that it is necessary for Japan to have a capability to strike "enemy's" base in a bid to cope with a ballistic missile offensive under the pretext of the DPRK's "missile threat" and increase the dependability of the Japan-U.S. alliance for the purpose of attacking missile launching bases and the like. This anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria comes under fire by a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday.
					 By the word "enemy" the Japanese military circles meant the DPRK and their trumpeting about "offensive" is aimed to secure a pretext for launching a war to stage a comeback to Korea, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Patriot interceptor missile remains a controversial issue in the U.S., too, as it cost a stupendous amount of fund and failed to hit even a missile which was flying on the designated track. Yet, the Japanese reactionaries are bluffing, depending on it. Their behavior is nothing but a hysteric fit of those who are seized with anti-DPRK confrontation lunacy.
					
					 They seem to push forward the moves to build a missile shield as a mere token of a "friendly gesture" to protect the U.S., their senior ally, from someone's "missile attack". Lurking behind this gesture is, however, a cynic ploy to fish in troubled waters by joining in the U.S. moves to establish the missile defense system. 
					
					 It is a chronic bad habit and method of aggression peculiar to Japan to realize its militarist ambition with the backing of a big power.
					
					 The DPRK is made the primary target of the Japanese reactionaries' overseas aggression. They are poised to start their overseas aggression with reinvasion of Korea as a prelude and set about conquering Asia and the rest of the world. 
					
					 Their moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK are little short of committing a suicide. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to wake up from a day dream and stop at once its harmful confrontation row, urges the commentary.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Joint Battle Simulation Room Opened to Media
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Joint Battle Simulation Room Opened to Media
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers opened a joint battle simulation room to media on March 11.
					 Set up in 1991, the room is used by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet military to stage computer-simulated military exercises under combined operation plans and analyze their results. It is not only linked with battle simulation rooms of the U.S. forces present in south Korea but maintains tele-communication with major U.S. military bases in its mainland, Japan and south Korea.
					
					 It is the first time that the above-said room was opened to media.
					
					 After setting the DPRK as an imaginary rival force, the warmongers use to counter it armed forces involving all services and arms under the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" huge enough to undertake a war.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. imperialists included in the forces even the U.S. 20th Support Command, a unit specially tasked to eliminate "WMDs" of the DPRK.
					
					 It has been discovered this time that the unit created in October 2004 has participated in the joint military exercises with an aim to get ready to perpetrate such brutal terrorist acts as destruction and assassination in the DPRK.
					
					 The commander of the U.S. forces present in south Korea, opening the said room to media, blustered that a simulation battle scenario called a war game would be applied into operations as it is in case a war breaks out.
					
					 The warmongers brought to daylight the fact that the above-said room is a centre for a war of aggression to put the "operation plan" simulating an invasion of the DPRK into practice.

articles.title: Lebanese Party Leader on Relations with WPK
articles.content:
Lebanese Party Leader on Relations with WPK
 Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Lebanese Communist Party highly appreciates the achievements made by the Korean people under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, said the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lebanese Communist Party when meeting the DPRK ambassador to Lebanon on March 10.
					 He expressed expectation that the relations between the LCP and the WPK and between the peoples of the two countries would more favorably develop.
					
					 The LCP will always render positive support to the Korean people in their persevering struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country from the imperialists' moves for aggression, he noted, expressing conviction that the Korean people would certainly emerge victorious in their anti-imperialist struggle.

articles.title: Parte delegacion coreana para la reunion de solidaridad con Cuba
articles.content:
Parte delegacion coreana para la reunion de solidaridad con Cuba
						
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ATCC) -- La delegacion del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba presidida por su titular Kim Yong Jin, ministro de Educacion, partio el dia 16 de esta capital para participar en la V reunion regional de Asia y el Pacifico para la solidaridad con ese pais caribeno que tendra lugar en Laos.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta nuevo "plan operacional 5012"
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta nuevo "plan operacional 5012"
						
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ATCC) -- Recientemente, fue revelado el hecho de que Estados Unidos y los belicistas titeres del Sur de Corea trazaron el "plan operacional 5012", nuevo plan operacional de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea bajo el rotulo de hacer frente al "retorno del derecho de control de operaciones para el tiempo de emergencia". Ellos terminaron ya hasta diciembre del ano pasado el debate sobre todos los problemas principales como el nombre, el sistema y el concepto del nuevo plan operacional, se dice.
					El periodico Minju Joson, en su comentario individual de este martes, pone al desnudo que el nuevo es el guion de guerra mas peligroso y provocativo que "el anterior 5027", plan de guerra total de agresion a la RPDC, y continua:
					
					EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos difunden de modo oficial a los medios de prensa los contenidos de este plan de guerra que seran mantenidos en absoluto secreto, lo cual constituye una abierta amenaza y chantaje a la RPDC y una prueba de su intento militar de aplastarla con las fuerzas armadas.
					
					Lo mas grave es que ellos lo aplican ya en los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Aplicando el quid de este plan operacional, libraron en agosto del ano pasado los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian" y en el presente ano, los "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho".
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran fehacientemente que son palabras vanas la "paz" y la "mejora de las relaciones" de que hablan tanto EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos, y abrigan solo la siniestra ambicion de aplastar con las fuerzas armadas a la RPDC.
					
					Debido a tales freneticas maniobras de guerra nuclear de agresion a la RPDC, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana llega al borde de la guerra.
					
					Si los enemigos provocan la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo de esta castigaran despiadadamente a los provocadores. Los belicistas yanquis y surcoreanos deben ver correctamente la voluntad revolucionaria del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y actuar con prudencia.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela intento de ataque preventivo nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela intento de ataque preventivo nuclear de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ATCC) -- En el plan operacional comprensivo "OPLAN8010" de la comandancia estrategica, que maneja la estrategia nuclear general de las tropas norteamericanas, se incluye el proyecto detallado de la operacion para lanzar el ataque preventivo nuclear contra varios paises definidos como sus "blancos potenciales", inclusive la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Igualmente, quedo revelado que en el nuevo informe de la politica nuclear, que elabora ultimamente la administracion norteamericana, esta anotado el plan de desarrollar el arma de nuevo tipo por el ataque preventivo frente a la supuesta "amenaza de misiles" proveniente de la RPDC.
					
					Tales hechos comprueban que entra en la etapa de ejecucion el intento de EE.UU. de atacar preventivamente a Corea con armas nucleares.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					Realizar la ambicion de dominar el mundo monopolizando las armas nucleares y tomando la heguemonia en el campo de armas de ataque estrategico, esto es la estrategia nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					El blanco principal en la realizacion de esa estrategia es precisamente la RPDC.
					
					Desde hace mucho tiempo, ese imperio tiene elaborado el plan sobre el particular y acecha la oportunidad para ponerlo en practica renovandolo constantemente.
					
					Especificamente, pretende atacar preventiva y sorpresivamente a la RPDC con artefactos nucleares con el fin de tomar primero toda la Peninsula Coreana y convertirla luego en la base estrategica en funcion de dominar y controlar militarmente la region asiatica.
					
					En ese contexto, los belicistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos libran ahora los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho".
					
					EE.UU. estaria muy equivocado si piensa que podra alcanzar su objetivo agresivo con el ataque preventivo nuclear a la RPDC.
					
					Las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de que ese intento aventurero buscara unicamente su autodestruccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta la campana anti-RPDC de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta la campana anti-RPDC de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual divulgado este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun denuncio a los reaccionarios japoneses que libran freneticamente la campana conflictiva con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea abogando, bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza de misiles" de esta, por adquirir la capacidad de atacar las bases "enemigas" frente al ataque de misiles balisticos y por dar mas credito a la alianza Japon-EE.UU.
					El "enemigo" a que alude la capa militar japonesa es la RPDC y el supuesto "ataque" es para preparar el pretexto de la guerra de reagredirla, precisa el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Parece que los reaccionarios japoneses actuan con fanfarroneria e histeria anti-RPDC depositando su confianza en los "PAC-3".
					
					Pero, este misil interceptor norteamericano resulta polemico en los mismos EE.UU., porque costo mucho dinero y no pudo batir ni el misil con trayectoria fija siquiera.
					
					Ellos promueven el desarrollo del sistema antimisiles con la frivola "amistad" consistente en "proteger" a su aliado superior EE.UU. desde el supuesto "ataque de misiles" de alguien. 
					
					De esta manera, quedaron mostrados una vez mas el vicio cronico y el metodo de agresion de Japon que satisface su ambicion militarista con el amparo de las potencias.
					
					Corea es fijada como primer blanco de la agresion a ultramar de los reaccionarios japoneses. 
					
					Al volver a agredirla, los reaccionarios japoneses intentan iniciar la agresion a ultramar y lanzarse a la conquista de Asia y el resto del mundo. 
					
					  Tales maniobras anti-RPDC de Japon devienen un acto de suicidio.
					
					  Japon debe abandonar su ilusion vana y poner de inmediato fin a su inutil campana de confrontacion.
